page.title: 16Lifestyles around Langho
page.content: People in the area tend to confirm to a middle-class life style . Typically most are owner occupiers employed in " white-collar " jobs with sufficient money to run 1 or 2 cars . Both partners of a marriage often work when children have all gone to school . Holidays abroad are the norm . Youngsters dress very much according to fashion and older people can usually afford to look very smart . People look after themselves and their property keeping gardens tidy and cleaning their cars . Shopping is a weekend job involving a journey to the nearest town rather than " corner - shop " buying . Most people in the area lead a comfotable life .
